SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: PROGRAMS WERE HELD FOR WOODSTOCK AREA ADULTS AND CHILDREN WHICH INCLUDED ART/MUSIC CLASSES, OPEN ART STUDIO TIMES, YOGA, THERAPEUTIC MOVEMENT CLASSES, AND NATURE CAMPS.

RlnOfActyToAccomOfExmptPrpsGrp.RelationshipStatementTxt: EACH OF THE ART AND MUSIC PROGRAMS NURTURES THE INHERENT CREATIVE CAPACITIES OF EACH PARTICIPANT THROUGH ART AND MUSIC EDUCATION.

ExplnOfNonFilingWithAGStmt.ExplanationTxt: ATTORNEY GENERAL OF VERMONT DOES NOT REQUIRE A 990-PF BE FURNISHED.HOWEVER, IF THE ATTORNEY GENERAL OR OTHER APPROPRIATE STATE OFFICIAL REQUESTS THE 990-PF THE FOUNDATION WILL PROVIDE A COPY.
